snippet.title: Dungeon of the Endless: Apogee - Mobile Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gather Dust, build up your defences and open the door at your own risks to escape from the mysterious Auriga planet with Dungeon of the Endless: Apogee, available on iOS and Android devices on March 16th.

Pre-order it on the App Store: bit.ly/DotEiOS
Pre-Register on Google Play: bit.ly/DotEAndroid

Learn more about the game: https://playdigious.com/dungeon-of-the-endless-apogee/
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playdigious​
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playdigious​
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/playdigious
